Bad word list: Each line may have several entries with commas between.  Semicolon comments.
All spaces are taken out of the text under text before comparison with this, so entries here should have spaces.
No need to double up on entries that will be caught by other entries.
If a longer version will be caught by the shorter, use only the shorter.
Faster to have fewer entries and take advantage of supersets.
e.g. 'bullshit' is caught by shit.
Comment out the duplicates, but do not delete.  We know that we considered them.
Shorten a fraction of a word that has no other purpose, e.g. "masturb', 'asshol'
Enter alternative spellings you can thing of.
When you can, use the fact the leet will replace some things to avoid similar entries.
The leet replace will try substituting:
original   subsitute
s           z
f           ph
keep easy test work at the top of the list.
ass -- would cause too many false positives (compass,  as sure as soon)
baby
ballz caught by leet check.
body
die
ph substitutions are caught by leet checker.
